mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.name, m.code, m.parent_id, m.ancestors, m.type FROM (SELECT id FROM menu WHERE code = #{code}) m1 JOIN menu m ON m.code = #{code} OR FIND_IN_SET(m1.id, m.ancestors) JOIN role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.id JOIN user u ON r.id = u.role_id AND u.id = #{userId};
